tasks.label: Terraform Build
dependsOn: Terraform Lint Fix and Fmt All
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then Terraform linting/formatting and validation in sequence (default build task)

tasks.label: Terraform Validate All
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then Terraform validation and linting across all components and blueprints

tasks.label: Terraform Validate
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then terraform validate in folder for current focused file

tasks.label: Terraform Docs Generation
tasks.detail: Generate Terraform documentation for all components

tasks.label: Terraform Lint Fix and Fmt All
tasks.detail: Fix Terraform linting issues and formatting across all components and blueprints

tasks.label: Terraform Lint Fix and Fmt
tasks.detail: Fix Terraform linting issues and formatting in folder for current file

tasks.label: Markdown Lint Fix
tasks.detail: Fix all Markdown formatting and linting issues

tasks.label: Terraform Init Upgrade
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then terraform init -upgrade project-wide on all terraform folders (needed when upgrading providers)

tasks.label: Terraform Test
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then terraform test in folder for current focused file

tasks.label: Terraform Test All
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then terraform test in every terraform folder (only use after changes to tests)

tasks.label: Terraform Plan (With Required Test Vars)
tasks.detail: Runs scripts/az-sub-init.sh then terraform plan with required vars for testing terraform plan, in folder for current focused file
